comments.body: am a bit surprised this does not share anything with the native resources or kube-openapi.

kube-openapi requires constructing a `*restful.WebService` to build the spec. We have a huge [function](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/b1a52a38e9e3651680655416cc7afbec5e119854/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/installer.go#L170-L874) doing this for native resources. Now I look back and think maybe we can refactor it and reuse some code. I will give it a try as a follow-up.

Efficiency of filling a template might be another minor reason
